meanings.sent1: She is a churchgoing woman who never misses a Sunday service.
meanings.sent2: The churchgoing community gathered for a special prayer event.
meanings.sent3: The churchgoing cat insisted on sitting in the pew during the service.
meanings.sent4: His churchgoing dedication shone brightly in the eyes of the congregation.
meanings.sent5: The churchgoing habits of the family were a source of inspiration for many.

meanings.definition: The act of going to church.
meanings.sent1: Her churchgoing brings her peace and solace every week.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the sense of community that comes with regular churchgoing.
meanings.sent3: The churchgoing of the squirrels in the garden always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: His churchgoing is like a beacon of hope in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The churchgoing of the birds at dawn is a beautiful sight to behold.
